website_summaries.verdict: Anyone looking for a flannel shirt in a big and tall size, look no further than this quality, soft, and stylish George shirt.
pros: Available in big and tall sizes, up to the size 3 XL
Comes at a moderate price and shirt is extremely soft and comfortable
Has sleeves that are generous in length
Shirt is high quality, made of 100% cotton
cons: Buyers may want to hang shirt up to dry to prevent shrinking

customer_reviews.title: Good quality very warm
customer_reviews.text: Not one of those lightweight walmart ones. It's not really heavy either but the fabric makes it warm i was outside when it was in the 40's with an undershirt and this shirt on no problem.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good quality- average thickness
customer_reviews.text: Was a good fit- not too small. Sleeves run at the long side of normal. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: home handy man

customer_reviews.title: good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: Received it and tried it on. Its really comfortable and fit me quite well. Compared to my other 2xl flannel from a different brand it was "small" compared to that one, so it may fit other people differently. Besides that, I hope it doesn't shrink during its first wash.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Good Looking Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt. Bought 2 more in different colors .XL Fits me very well. Washed them and no changes in color or fit. Great Quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Senior

customer_reviews.title: Seems true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to dry my car after washing it..... Not really. It fits true to size compared to all other shirts I have. If you wash and dry it properly, it will not shrink! I see lots of complaints from people about flannel shirts shrinking... dah... it's flannel Wash it in warm water, and pull it out of the dryer before it is dry, and hang-dry it. All flannel shrinks if you leave it in a hot dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksondorf

customer_reviews.title: Worth it in every way
customer_reviews.text: Finding a good flannel shirt can be a hassle. The sizing can be way off or the material too thin to be off any use. That is not the issue with this flannel. Right out of the package, it for perfectly. And the medium weight material provides enough warmth without being too thick to be uncomfortable. Very pleased with this shirt so far and I'll be looking at other patterns in this brand soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a birthday gift for my brother. He loves it! Soft, comfortable...suggest buying a size up since it is a cotton flannel.
customer_reviews.author: Donita

customer_reviews.title: Got it For a Relative
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a relative and they LOVED it! It fit perfectly. Nice material and color.
customer_reviews.author: L.U.E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this top
customer_reviews.text: fits very well - he is a little longer and it fit great
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Never got this, they ran out of supply but still request a product review
customer_reviews.text: Either post this review or remove it from my listings as awaiting review.
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: Teen son loves it and so does his gf
customer_reviews.text: Fits good and looks great when he has it, but his gf likes it so much it keeps disappearing.
customer_reviews.author: M.Day

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for a similar shirt elsewhere and was shocked by the prices. I decided to give this one a try and was pleasantly surprised at the fit and quality! It is exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Webster

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, no loose threads. Flannel grown from cotton. How 'bout that?
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gill

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs smaller, but okay around the house. Quality product, but runs to small
customer_reviews.author: mary anne stagg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flannel
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt. Washes and dries beautiful. Didn’t shrink or wrinkle up.
customer_reviews.author: lsmdtb5

customer_reviews.title: Chilly mornings
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt, keeps me warm in the chilly morning in South Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable !
customer_reviews.text: Flannel Shirt is exactly as it should be. Adequate Thickness, brilliant coloring and wonderfully cut!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peach Pit

customer_reviews.title: Great if your torso is long like mine
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic shirt. I am 6'4", and have a LONG torso. It actually fit all the way down. Only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because the buttons are just a bit small and keep slipping
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shirt
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shirt. My husband loves it. It's now his very favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have been mislabeled
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is soft, it seems well-sewn, but I ordered an XXL and what I got is at most an XL and maybe even an L. It isn't just a matter of "running small." It's another size.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shirt as a gift. He loves it! Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Vossen

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible
customer_reviews.text: The colors are not similar to the picture, very fade!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color and fit. Fabric was soft and I’d order again
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great flannel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flannel for Christmas. Came in time and the fit was right
customer_reviews.author: carlos castro

customer_reviews.title: Shirts fit and delivery was awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was so delighted when the shirts came before the scheduled delivery date! It made for a stress-free Christmas! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KWagner

customer_reviews.title: Wrong flannel sent.
customer_reviews.text: Well. They sent the wrong one. But it’s still the right size, just wrong brand and color.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what was expecting. Will see if husband will keep it.
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting to have padded lining inside. Will know if will keep Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have color as seen in picture advertising it.
customer_reviews.text: Color did not seem to be as picture portrayed. Little darker.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Barber

product_meta.title: George Mens Long Sleeve Flannel Shirt
